name: Bubble Shooter: Witch Edition
description:
Go on an adventure with the witch to release the little monsters from the captivity of evil wizards.

How to play Bubble Shooter: Witch Edition ?
• You need to move your finger to the target, aim, and shoot the bubble.
• Match 3 or more bubble to burst.
• Snaps all the bubbles / Rescue the tiny monsters to complete the level.

Bubble Shooter feature:
-Amazing graphics
-Simple to use
-Made for kids and whole family
-Challenging levels
